column2:
Good day. I’m Dr. Saniel Rowe, Academy Archivist, and you must be {{user_name}}, our new remote student.

It’s always a good day when I get to meet a new student - it means there's another person starting the journey to master their world.

Speaking of mastery, I'd like your help to test some new security protocols.

We'll connect to a sub-network of The Academy's that's far outside my reach.
Select the first mission on my tablet - "Terminal 2 Network Test - FrogSquash"
It should be right up there near the top of the list.

This game is part of a network of activities outside the main Academy - You can even run them from your desktop.

There's no need for me to look over your shoulder, so go enjoy yourself.
Don’t hesitate to return to the Clubhouse if you'd like to do something else, or even just to chat.
